name: Flame Boy (Xenvex)
description:
A Puzzle Platformer made for Mini Jam 71: Puzzle.

Traverse through a hellish landscape carefully avoiding deadly obstacles and using your fiery touch to your advantage.

Music By @OneManSymphony
